Class Hero

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.entity.Hero
public class Hero extends Object
Represents the hero character in the game with attributes such as health points, energy, mana, and block. The hero can take damage, use energy, and manage mana for abilities.
Author:
Yacine

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Hero()
    Creates a new Hero with default attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero()
      Creates a new Hero with default attributes. The hero starts with maximum HP, full energy, zero mana and no block.

      the current health points

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if the hero is alive (hp > 0).
      Returns:
      true if the hero is alive, false otherwise

    • setHp

      public void setHp(int hp)
      Sets the health points of the hero, ensuring it stays within valid bounds.
      Parameters:
      hp - the new health points value

    • setMana

      public void setMana(int mana)

    • refreshManaAmount

      public void refreshManaAmount(Backpack backpack)
      Refreshes the mana amount of the hero based on the contents of the backpack.
      Parameters:
      backpack - the backpack containing mana items
